OOC - Last one I swear

Welcome to the fact unless you basically complain a=
bout no one acknowledging you no one will. Though what might certainly help=
 is giving some idea where you've went down. Most bases have a limited comm=
 range as do bots sotry including your characters location :)

  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: Starcasm6@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
  Sent: Sunday, January 20, 2002 11:04 PM
  Subject: stranded


  ( ooc: =
I REALLY wish some one would acknowledge my posts. c'mon guys, i'm new. hel=
p me out.) 
  ghost:  okay, nobody is replying, so I figure we just do some=
 serious rolling. 
  goth: Well that might work, if not for the two day dri=
ve to maximal city. according to what's left of the onboard computer, we're=
 somewhere in south africa. 
  Ghost. do we have a choice? alright then, le=
t's roll out. i'll keep calling, though, just to  keep you quiet. 
  goth: =
thanks, dick. 
  ghost: no problem, pansy.
